title: Timers
text:
Timer Readings

  • SKIP:
    • Section 11.3.2.2: Real-Time Clock Timer Mode
    • Section 11.3.2.3: Input Edge-Count Mode
    • Sections 11.3.3 - 11.3.5: Wait-for-trigger Mode, Synchronizing GP Timer Blocks, DMA
    • Section 11.3.7: Accessing Concatenated 32/64-bit Wide GPTM Register Values
  • IMPORTANT registers:
    • Register 1: GPTM Configuration (GPTMCFG): TIMER#_CFG_R
    • Register 2, 3: GPTM Timer A(B) Mode (GPTMTA(B)MR): TIMER#_TA(B)MR_R
    • Register 4: GPTM Control (GPTMCTL): TIMER#_CTL_R
    • Register 6: GPTM Interrupt Mask (GPTMIMR): TIMER#_IMR_R
    • Register 7: GPTM Raw Interrupt Status Mask (GPTMRIS): TIMER#_RIS_R
    • Register 8: GPTM Masked Interrupt Status (GPTMMIS): TIMER#_MIS_R
    • Register 9: GPTM Interrupt Clear (GPTMICR): TIMER#_ICR_R
    • Register 10, 11: GPTM Timer A(B) Interval Load (GPTMTA(B)ILR): TIMER#_TA(B)ILR_R
    • Register 12, 13: GPTM Timer A(B) Match (GPTMTA(B)MATCHR): TIMER#_TA(B)MATCHR_R
    • Register 14, 15: GPTM Timer A(B) Prescale (GPTMTA(B)PR): TIMER#_TA(B)PR_R
    • Register 16, 17: GPTM Timer A(B) Prescale Match (GPTMTA(B)PMR): TIMER#_TA(B)PMR_R
    • Register 18, 19: GPTM Timer A(B) (GPTMTA(B)R): TIMER#_TA(B)R_R
    • Register 20, 21: GPTM Timer A(B) Value (GPTMTA(B)V): TIMER#_TA(B)V_R
    • Section 5.5, page 338: Register 59: GP Timer Run Mode Clk Gating Control: SYSCTL_RCGCTIMER_R
  • Textbook 9.1 - 9.2: a good supplement to the Datasheet, as needed (~30 pages)
    • Note: Figure 9.1 is useful
    • Note: Figure 9.10 is a useful Periodic Timer code example.
    • Note: Figure 9.14 is a useful Input-Edge Time Mode (Input capture) code example.
    • Note: Figure 9.17 is a useful PMW Mode code example.
